text: Taksim Square is an area in BeyoÄŸlu, Istanbul, Turkey. Sometimes it is called the heart of Istanbul. On 1 May 1977 at a Labour Day celebration, there were more than 500,000 people in the square. Taksim Square has a Republican Monument which was built in 1928. title: Taksim Square
